author: craigmcc
msg: Since nobody is paying attention to the existing practice OR to my proposal,
give up and go with the flow.
Can we at least agree to do ONE thing the same -- format the output of the
"ant dist" target (i.e. the "build" subdirectory) as follows?
Consistency will become much more important as CJAN emerges.

author: craigmcc
msg: Conform to majority practice on the location of build.xml and
build.properties.sample.  I don't care all that much, as long as it's not

author: craigmcc
msg: Migrate the build.xml file into a "build" subdirectory for consistency
